page.title: 19Employment for Curdridge.
page.content: Curdridge is an agricultural area, so we tried to find out how far the parents of Curdridge school children travelled each day for work. {m}mother{Places of employment f}father {m f} { f Waltham Chase 1 Gosport { } 4 Bishops Waltham 4 2 Portsmouth 3 Park Gate 1 1 Otterbourne 1 Boorley Green 1 1 Storrington(S) 1 Wickham 2 1 Basingstoke 1 Eastleigh 1 2 Titchfield 2 Droxford 1 West End 1 Botley 3 1 Woolston 1 Southampton 3 2 Hamble 1 Havant 1 Waterlooville 1 Swanmore 1 1 Fawley 1 Fareham 1 2 Winchester 3 Curdridge 7 4 Whitechurch(B) 1 At home 2 Twyford 2 Travelling 2 Hursley 1 No job 11 (B)-Bucks.(S)-Sussex
